property_title: High Rental Return Apartment For Sale in Valley Park Alanya
property_description:
If you're looking for an affordable investment opportunity inAlanya, this 2 room apartment in Valley Park Cikcilli may be exactly what you need. With its central location, full social amenities, and excellent rental potential, it combines value with practicality. Whether you're buying your first property in Turkey or expanding your portfolio, this apartment offers both comfort and opportunity.

Investment-Friendly 2 Room Apartment for Sale in Valley Park – Unfurnished, Modern, and Centrally Located

This 2 room apartment for sale in Alanya is situated in the peaceful Cikcilli neighborhood, inside the two-block residential complex known as Valley Park. The apartment features a compact yet efficient design, with a gross area of 53 m² and a net usage space of 50 m². With one bedroom and an open-plan living room with kitchen, it’s ideal for singles, couples, or long-term tenants looking for quality living near Alanyum Shopping Mall.

Completed in July 2022, the property is in excellent condition and offered for sale unfurnished—giving new owners the freedom to personalize the interior. Thanks to its location and site amenities, the apartment holds strong potential for both capital appreciation and consistent rental income.

Property Features – Compact, Functional, and Well-Planned

Similarly to larger units, this 2 room flat includes thoughtful details that enhance everyday living. The layout prioritizes light, airflow, and practicality, all while maximizing usable space.

Key Highlights:

  • Total size: 53 m² gross / 50 m² net

  • Rooms: 1 bedroom + 1 open-plan living room and kitchen

  • Year of construction: July 2022

  • Condition: Unfurnished

  • View: City and mountain panorama

  • Site structure: 2 residential blocks

  • Payment: Cash discount available through Luxury Estate Turkey

As a result, this home is perfect for both permanent residence and short-term rental scenarios. Moreover, investors can expect strong demand due to its location near central Alanya and Alanyum Mall.

Interior Potential – A Blank Canvas to Design Your Lifestyle

Because the apartment is offered unfurnished, it allows the buyer full creative control. You can easily craft a space that suits your needs—whether it's a modern minimalist rental or a cozy private retreat.

Equally important, the open-plan kitchen and living room design increases the sense of space. The bedroom comfortably fits a queen-sized bed and a wardrobe, while the large windows bring in daylight and frame scenic views of the city and Taurus Mountains.

In addition, smart finishes such as durable flooring and pre-installed lighting points make the home move-in ready once furnished.

On-Site Amenities – Resort-Like Features at Your Doorstep

Valley Park is more than just a residential building—it’s a community. The complex includes a wide array of shared spaces and leisure facilities, promoting an active, social lifestyle.

Site Facilities:

  • Outdoor pool and children’s pool

  • Fitness center and steam room

  • Sauna and garden landscape

  • Playground and basketball court

  • BBQ area and shaded camellia spots

  • Elevator and coded entry system

  • Generator and 24/7 security camera system

  • On-site caretaker and open parking lot

Furthermore, all amenities are well-maintained and designed for year-round use. Whether you want to swim, work out, or enjoy a quiet afternoon under the trees, it’s all within reach.

Why Cikcilli Is a Smart Choice for Property Buyers?

Cikcilli is located in the northeast part of Alanya and has grown rapidly as a modern, family-friendly district. On the one hand, it offers calm surroundings away from the tourist crowds. On the other, it's still deeply connected to Alanya’s vibrant city life.

For instance, the neighborhood is home to Alanyum Shopping Mall—offering clothing stores, supermarkets, cafés, and playgrounds. Nearby you'll also find fitness centers, bowling alleys, and medical facilities. Despite not having its own beach, Cikcilli’s proximity to Oba and Tosmur ensures easy beach access within minutes.

Public transportation is frequent, with minibuses and city buses passing every 10 minutes. Likewise, taxis are available almost everywhere. The newly expanded ring road further shortens commute times to central Alanya and beyond.

In terms of dining, the area is filled with affordable and quality restaurants. You’ll also find a mix of Turkish bakeries, coffee shops, and international chains. Therefore, Cikcilli is an ideal living option for those seeking both convenience and calm.

Who Should Consider This Apartment?

This compact but practical 2 room apartment in Alanya Cikcilli is especially well-suited for:

  • Investors looking for a rental-ready unit with low entry cost

  • Digital nomads or singles seeking a quiet yet central location

  • First-time property buyers in Turkey

  • Buyers looking for a modern, maintenance-free flat

  • Those who want a second home close to shopping, hospitals, and transport

With its low upkeep and high potential for rental income, it presents a strategic choice for value-oriented buyers.

Our Services Include:

  • Discount negotiation for cash purchases

  • Rental setup consultation

  • Post-sale follow-up and management help

We go beyond listings—we help you secure a future.

Mahmutlar – A Neighborhood Balancing Everyday Living and Holiday Spirit

Mahmutlar has become one of the most popular districts of Alanya, well known for its balance between residential comfort and a vibrant yet relaxed holiday atmosphere. Located only 10 km east of Alanya city center, it stretches several kilometers along the Mediterranean coast, framed by sandy beaches on one side and the Taurus Mountains on the other.

Walking through Mahmutlar, you immediately notice how international and diverse the community feels. A significant expat population lives here permanently, creating a cosmopolitan yet family-friendly environment. Cafes operated by local families sit next to international chains, and weekly open-air markets fill the streets with color and aroma. On Tuesdays, the famous local bazaar brings residents together with fresh produce, traditional Turkish textiles, and handmade goods.

Transportation is another strength. Local minibuses connect Mahmutlar internally and run frequently towards Kargƒ±cak. Meanwhile, buses to Alanya center pass every 10 minutes, making the city easily reachable. Taxis are readily available on almost every corner. For shopping, residents enjoy the Yekta Mall and Akdeniz Park shopping centers, while small butchers, bakeries, and hardware shops are scattered throughout the district.

Moreover, Mahmutlar is not just about convenience; it is also about lifestyle. The beaches are perfect for swimming, sunbathing, and water sports, while the Taurus Mountains provide hiking and picnic opportunities. Cycling paths run along the coast, and fitness centers, hamams, and yoga studios are easy to find. In short, Mahmutlar has become a district where retirees, young professionals, digital nomads, and families all find their rhythm.

Apartment Overview – A Compact and Functional Layout

This2 room apartment in Mahmutlarhas a total area of 63 m², offering an efficient yet comfortable living space. The layout consists of:

  • Living Room with Kitchen Area:Designed to maximize space, the open concept living area provides flexibility for arranging furniture. Large windows allow daylight to flow inside, creating a bright and inviting atmosphere.

  • Bedroom:The separate bedroom offers enough room for a double bed and wardrobes, ensuring comfort and privacy.

  • Bathroom:Modern in design, the bathroom is fitted with durable materials and practical features.

  • Balcony:A private balcony extends the living space outdoors, perfect for enjoying a morning coffee or relaxing after the beach.

Because the apartment comesunfurnished, new owners have the opportunity to personalize the space fully according to their taste. Whether you prefer minimalist Scandinavian lines, a Mediterranean style with light colors and natural textures, or a classic look with warm tones, the apartment provides a neutral base ready for transformation.

Complex Facilities – Resort-Like Amenities in Daily Life

Taurus Residence was designed with a strong focus on comfort and social living. Its facilities ensure that residents enjoy both relaxation and activity within the secure complex.

  • Outdoor Pool:The main swimming pool is perfect for cooling down in the summer heat.

  • Children’s Pool:Families with kids appreciate the safety of a separate pool for children.

  • Indoor Pool:Heated and usable during winter, it extends the swimming season year-round.

  • Fitness Center:Residents can maintain an active lifestyle without leaving the complex.

In addition, the complex isdisabled-friendly, which makes it accessible to residents and guests of all ages and mobility levels. Consequently, Taurus Residence feels more like a boutique resort than a standard residential block.

Location Advantages – Walking Distance to Everything

One of the biggest strengths of this property is its location. TheMediterranean Sea is only 700 metres away, which equals a comfortable 8–9 minutes of walking. This means daily swimming or evening strolls along the seaside promenade become part of your lifestyle.

Meanwhile, Mahmutlar center is just500 metres from the residence—about 6–7 minutes on foot. Here you can find supermarkets, pharmacies, cafes, and restaurants, ensuring daily convenience without relying on a car.

Public transport is easily accessible, with bus stops just a short walk away. From there, frequent buses take you to Alanya center in less than 20 minutes. The location thus offers a balance: close enough to Alanya for cultural and social activities, yet peaceful enough for calm daily living.

Investment Value – A Practical and Affordable Option

This2 room apartment in Taurus Residenceis not only a living space but also a smart investment.

  1. High Rental Potential:Compact apartments in Mahmutlar are always in demand for long-term rental among expats and seasonal workers.

  2. Holiday Rental Market:Proximity to the beach and full facilities make it attractive for short-term holiday rentals.

  3. Affordable Entry Point:With its 63 m² size and unfurnished condition, the apartment is competitively priced, providing investors with a lower entry point compared to larger units.

Therefore, whether you plan to live here or rent it out, the apartment secures both lifestyle benefits and financial returns.

  • Young Couples or Singles:The size and location make it perfect as a first home or holiday base.

  • Investors:Affordable purchase, high rental yield, and good resale value ensure profitability.

  • Retirees:The manageable size, proximity to the beach, and wellness facilities inside the complex appeal to retirees seeking low-maintenance living.

Furnished 2 Room Apartment for Sale in Antares Hill Mahmutlar – 1400m to the Sea, with Mountain & Nature Views

If you’ve ever imagined waking up to the rugged beauty of the Taurus Mountains and ending your day with a swim under the warm Mediterranean sun, this 2 roomapartment for sale in  AlanyaMahmutlar's Antares Hill Residence turns that vision into reality.

Nestled in the peaceful yet socially active district of Mahmutlar, it offers a lifestyle where modern comfort blends with fresh coastal air, and where you’re always just minutes away from both nature’s calm and the conveniences of city life.

From the windows and private glass-enclosed balcony, you can take in uninterrupted views of the mountains, lush greenery, and the sparkling pool below, turning even an ordinary morning coffee into a postcard-worthy experience. Whether you’re relaxing indoors or stepping out to explore, the property surrounds you with natural light, space, and an effortless sense of well-being.

Interior Design – Modern Comfort with a Touch of Style

Location Advantages – Life in Alanya,Mahmutlar Area

A large international community, particularly from Europe and Russia, gives the district a cosmopolitan yet welcoming atmosphere. Between the Mediterranean shoreline and the Taurus Mountains, Mahmutlar offers a rare balance of beachside leisure and nature escapes.

Its long, palm-lined coastline is perfect for walking, cycling, or enjoying water sports such as jet skiing, paddleboarding, and fishing. The beachfront promenade is dotted with cafés, casual eateries, and restaurants serving everything from traditional Turkish dishes to international cuisine. Small, family-run coffee shops bring a warm local charm, while well-known brands provide familiar flavors.

property_title: Apartment with Sea & Nature View in State of Art Residence Alanya
property_description:
Walking into this2 room apartment for sale in Mahmutlar, the first feeling is pure freshness. The interior is completely unfurnished, so you are greeted by wide white walls, glossy marble-look floors, and the freedom to shape the space however you like. It doesn’t dictate a style; it simply offers you the freedom to create your own.

This sense of openness is a huge advantage. Some apartments come with heavy furniture that restricts your vision. Here, the 60 m² layout offers a blank canvas where you can imagine everything—from a minimalist Scandinavian palette to a colorful Mediterranean style. The southeast-facing orientation makes natural light flow abundantly, and big windows allow the outdoors to become part of the interior atmosphere. Even without furniture, the apartment already feels airy and inviting.

Living Area – Where Style Meets Practicality

The open-plan living room with an American kitchen forms the heart of this apartment. The kitchen is defined by its black countertop against crisp white cabinetry, creating a modern and timeless contrast. Because the space is unfurnished, you can add your personality—maybe a cozy L-shaped sofa, a round dining table near the balcony doors, or a couple of high stools for a breakfast corner.

The marble-look flooring gives the room an instant sense of elegance. Even the simplest pieces of furniture will look elevated against this polished background. And thanks to the open-plan design, conversations between the kitchen and living area flow easily—perfect for hosting friends or simply enjoying evenings with family.

Bedrooms – Calm Corners for Rest and Privacy

The apartment offers two bedrooms, each adaptable for different needs. The master bedroom benefits from southeast light, making it a cheerful and warm space in the mornings. Imagine soft curtains in sandy tones, a comfortable bed with pastel linens, and maybe a wall art piece that reflects your taste—it’s easy to picture this room becoming a peaceful retreat.

The second bedroom is smaller but versatile. It can be used as a guest room, a child’s bedroom, or even a home office. Digital nomads who relocate to Mahmutlar often appreciate having a dedicated workspace, and this room could be styled to serve both work and relaxation. Again, the beauty of the apartment being unfurnished is that you have complete freedom to decide.

Balcony Life – Mornings with the Sea, Evenings with the Mountains

Step out onto the balcony and the experience changes completely. Here, you’re reminded that this is not just an apartment but a Mediterranean home. On one side, the sea shimmers in blue. On the other, the Taurus Mountains create a dramatic green backdrop.

This balcony is not just a small outdoor corner—it’s a true extension of your living space. In the morning, it’s a breakfast spot with fresh air and sea breeze. During the day, it’s a quiet reading corner. And in the evening, it becomes the perfect stage for sunsets, drinks with friends, or simply reflecting on the day. Many foreign buyers fall in love with apartments in Mahmutlar specifically because of balconies like this: large enough to furnish, private enough to enjoy, and always with a view worth framing.

Resort-Style Living Every Day

One of the strongest selling points ofState of Art Residence Mahmutlaris the complex itself. Living here feels less like owning an apartment and more like holding a membership at a five-star resort.

Residents enjoy:

  • Two Swimming Pools– a refreshing outdoor pool for sunny days and an indoor heated pool for winter use.

  • Fitness, Sauna, Hamam, and Steam Room– wellness facilities that let you keep both body and mind balanced all year round.

  • Children’s Playground– safe spaces where little ones can play, while parents relax.

  • Gazebos and Green Areas– landscaped gardens and shaded resting spots that give the complex a calm, park-like feeling.

  • Parking and Generator– practical features that make daily life easy and secure.

  • On-Site Caretaker– ensuring the complex remains clean, safe, and well-maintained.

In short, daily life here has a built-in holiday atmosphere. You can finish work, head downstairs for a swim, relax in the sauna, or join neighbors in the garden for a chat. The facilities are designed not just for convenience but to genuinely enrich everyday living.

Who Will Love This Apartment?

Young Couples and Newlyweds
Because it’s unfurnished, this apartment allows complete personalization. Couples can design their first home together from scratch, turning a blank space into a warm and stylish nest.

Investors
With its central Mahmutlar location, proximity to the beach, and full facilities, this property has excellent rental potential. Both long-term tenants and short-term holidaymakers look for exactly this type of home: new, modern, and resort-style.

Holiday Home Seekers
If you want the comfort of a five-star hotel but the privacy of your own apartment, this is an ideal match. The facilities replicate the holiday resort feel, while the apartment itself gives you a personal retreat.

Minimalist City Buyers
Some people love clean, light-filled spaces without clutter. This apartment’s white tones and bright interior already feel minimalist—perfect for buyers who prefer simplicity.

Mahmutlar – The International Side of Alanya

Mahmutlar is a unique district of Alanya because it blends a calm lifestyle with a strong international community. Many foreigners live here permanently, and as a result, the area offers everything from international restaurants to shops catering to daily needs.

The seaside promenade stretches for kilometers, lined with cafes where you can sip Turkish tea or enjoy global cuisine. The backdrop of the Taurus Mountains adds a natural beauty that residents never tire of. Weekly markets bring fresh fruits, vegetables, and local products. Small shops, bakeries, and butchers are scattered across the district, while larger malls like Yekta Mall and Akdeniz Park provide modern shopping convenience.

Transportation is simple: local buses run every 10 minutes to Alanya center, only 10 km away. For shorter trips, taxis are available on every corner. Many residents also cycle, as the flat roads and coastal paths are perfect for biking.

Mahmutlar has a special appeal for families and retirees who want peace, as well as for younger buyers seeking a lively but not overwhelming lifestyle. You get the best of both worlds—calm residential atmosphere and easy access to all city amenities.

Smart Investment with Lifestyle Value

From a financial perspective, this apartment makes sense. Properties in Mahmutlar hold value well, especially those within modern complexes with full facilities. Because this residence is close to the sea, centrally located, and brand new, it sits in one of the most desirable segments of the market.

High rental demand ensures steady income for investors. At the same time, buyers looking for a permanent home or holiday base benefit from the lifestyle value: sea views, modern design, and access to everything on foot. In other words, it’s both a smart investment and a comfortable home.

Experience, Honesty, and Ongoing Support

Choosing to work with Luxury Estate Turkey means more than just finding a property. Our team offers guidance every step of the way—from legal checks to residency and citizenship support. We know the Turkish real estate market deeply and provide transparent advice, realistic expectations, and long-term assistance.

What we promise is simple:

  • Clear and Honest Communication– no surprises, no hidden details.

  • After-Sale Services– our relationship doesn’t end with the purchase; we stay with you for the long run.

Whether you’re buying for investment or a home, our goal is to make the process smooth, secure, and profitable.

property_title: 2022 Built Apartment in United Suite Residence Alanya
property_description:
Can a compact home in Alanya still deliver the freedom of a resort lifestyle?

In Alanya's Oba neighborhood, life moves at a perfect pace between sandy beaches, vibrant markets, and all the modern conveniences you need. But not everyone is looking for huge spaces or massive villas. Many people - young couples, those who visit seasonally, or smart investors - want something that's both efficient and offers a great lifestyle. That's exactly what you'll find in this fully furnished 2-room, 44 m²home in Alanyaat United Suite Residence.

 

The building was completed in 2022, so everything feels fresh and modern, with plenty of family-friendly amenities. It sits just 2400 meters from the sea and 1500 meters from Oba's bustling center - close enough to enjoy everything, but far enough to have your peace and quiet. Whether you're buying your first place and want something manageable, looking for good rental returns as an investor, or simply want a cozy summer getaway as a couple, this apartment ticks all the boxes without sacrificing comfort.

Designed for Maximum Use of Space

The compact size of this apartment is not a limitation but a design challenge solved with intelligence.

Living Room and Kitchen
An open-plan design ensures that the main living space feels larger than its footprint. White cabinetry reflects daylight, while a black countertop anchors the kitchen with contrast. The backsplash follows the same theme, clean and functional. Floors are finished with glossy ceramic tiles, enhancing brightness and creating the illusion of more space.

The living room area features a brown leather-look sofa that adds warmth to the otherwise neutral palette. Opposite, a minimalist TV unit provides both storage and clean lines, leaving room for personal customization. Together, these choices produce a practical yet inviting atmosphere.

Bedroom
The bedroom makes the most of natural light, thanks to wide glass doors that lead to the balcony. Light parquet floors pair with pastel walls to create a soft, restful tone. A dark headboard provides contrast, while airy curtains allow for either privacy or openness depending on the moment. This is a room designed for both comfort and calm.

Balcony
Balconies in Alanya are essential extensions of living space, and this one delivers. Long and functional, it overlooks the pool area, making it an ideal setting for relaxed evenings or morning coffee. With just a few pieces of outdoor furniture, it can become a second living room during the summer months.

Atmosphere
Minimalism defines the apartment. Instead of crowding the rooms with furniture, the design leaves breathing space. This allows new owners to easily personalize — whether with art, textiles, or smart furniture solutions. For investors, it means a universally appealing aesthetic that attracts tenants quickly.

Facilities That Enrich Daily Living

United Suite Residence demonstrates that small apartments can still belong to a complex with big advantages. Residents enjoy:

  • Outdoor pool with waterslide

  • Sauna and jacuzzi for relaxation

  • Fitness center to maintain an active lifestyle

  • Landscaped green areas and barbecue zones for social gatherings

  • Lobby and caretaker services that add professionalism to the residence

  • Children’s pool, play areas, and dedicated kids’ rooms for family convenience

  • 24/7 camera systems ensuring security

These facilities elevate the apartment’s function from a simple base to a place where both relaxation and social life can flourish.

Oba – A Neighborhood That Balances Life

Owning a home in Oba is about more than the apartment itself. It is about a neighborhood designed for comfort.

Imagine mornings at the open-air markets on Mondays and Thursdays, where fresh produce and handmade goods fill the streets. Afternoons walking or cycling along palm-lined seafront paths. Evenings spent exploring international restaurants or simply enjoying the quiet of residential streets.

Oba is also practical:

  • Major supermarkets and pharmacies are spread across the area.

  • Public transport is reliable, with buses linking to Alanya’s center and nearby districts.

  • Alanya Training and Research Hospital provides quality healthcare just minutes away.

  • Schools, sports areas, and shopping venues ensure every need is close.

For families, professionals, or retirees, Oba’s combination of leisure and infrastructure makes daily life seamless.

Who Will Find This Apartment Ideal?

Young Couples or Singles

With manageable size and low maintenance, the apartment suits those beginning their property journey. The fitness, sauna, and pool facilities enrich everyday life without requiring extensive upkeep.

Families Seeking a Holiday Base

While compact, the apartment works well as a seasonal retreat. Children benefit from pools and play areas, while parents enjoy easy access to the beach and city center.

Investors

At 44 m², the apartment is cost-efficient, with minimal upkeep expenses. Furnished and modern, it appeals strongly to seasonal renters. High rental potential is supported by Oba’s popularity among foreign visitors and long-term residents.

Digital Nomads and Students

For those working remotely or studying, the apartment’s layout is functional enough for both living and working. Its location near central amenities ensures that lifestyle and productivity coexist smoothly.

A Smart Investment Choice

What makes this property stand out for investors is its combination of:

  • Low purchase and maintenance costs

  • Strong demand for compact, furnished rentals

  • Proximity toAlanya center and the beach

  • Position in a modern complex with resort-style facilities

Seasonal rentals can yield attractive short-term returns, while long-term leases ensure steady income. With Alanya’s market growing and demand from international buyers increasing, such properties are expected to maintain strong liquidity and appreciation.

A Partner in Turkey You Can Trust!

Luxury Estate Turkey understands that buying property abroad can feel complex. Our mission is to simplify the process, offering guidance tailored to your needs.

  • Local Insight– We know the Alanya market inside and out, ensuring you make informed decisions.

  • Ongoing Assistance– From rental management to resale strategies, our support continues long after purchase.

  • Inspection Trips– For international clients, we arrange visits that let you experience properties and neighborhoods firsthand.

When you choose us, you gain more than a property consultant in Turkey — you gain a partner committed to your financial security and daily comfort.

Mahmutlar – A Popular District Balancing Tourism and Residential Comfort

Mahmutlar stretches along the Mediterranean coastline between sandy beaches and the foothills of the Taurus Mountains. This location makes it one of the most attractive districts in Alanya for both locals and international residents. Only 10 km away from Alanya city center, Mahmutlar provides a quieter lifestyle while still offering everything you need within walking distance.

The district has a strong expat community, with a high number of foreign residents who have made Mahmutlar their home. Consequently, you will find a unique cultural mix in everyday life—family-run Turkish cafés stand next to international coffee chains, and traditional bakeries are located near global supermarkets.

Moreover, Mahmutlar is full of recreational activities. The long beach promenade is excellent for swimming, jogging, cycling, or enjoying sunset walks. Water sports and fishing opportunities abound along the coastline. Behind the town, the Taurus Mountains invite you for hiking, picnics, and fresh mountain air. The area also offers multiple gyms, hamams, and wellness centers for a balanced lifestyle.

When it comes to shopping, Mahmutlar does not disappoint. Weekly bazaars like the famous Tuesday market (Salƒ± Pazarƒ±) supply fresh produce, spices, and textiles. For bigger needs, shopping centers such as YektaMall and Akdeniz Park are close at hand. In daily life, small butchers, bakeries, and hardware shops can be found across the town.

Transportation is both simple and frequent. Local minibuses connect Mahmutlar with Kargƒ±cak and Kestel, while buses to Alanya center run every 10 minutes. Taxis are easily available almost everywhere, providing reliable access whenever needed.

Because of its accessibility, international lifestyle, and safe environment, Mahmutlar has become one of the most attractive choices for families, digital nomads, retirees, and property investors.

Therefore, Edge Residence functions like a self-sufficient community where residents can live, relax, and socialize in comfort.

Apartment Layout – Compact, Modern, and Inviting

This2 room apartment in Mahmutlarmeasures 50 m² and consists of one bedroom, one living room with an open kitchen, and a balcony. Despite its compact size, the layout makes clever use of space, offering a functional and comfortable living environment.

Living Room & Kitchen

The living area has been decorated with light-colored rugs and furniture, which make the space feel larger and more open. Black accents—including curtains, floor lamps, clocks, and the coffee table—create a striking contrast, adding sophistication and balance.

Large plants are placed strategically around the room, bringing freshness, natural energy, and vibrancy. The TV unit has been kept simple, while the built-in electric fireplace effect above the screen adds warmth and coziness, turning the living room into a welcoming gathering point.

The open-plan kitchen, though compact, is highly functional. Black-and-white cabinets provide a timeless modern look, while the countertop and backsplash ensure both durability and style. Together, the living room and kitchen form a practical, elegant space where daily life flows easily.

Bedroom

The bedroom design emphasizes warmth and intimacy. Floral-patterned bed linens create a romantic and cozy atmosphere, while wooden details add natural charm. Decorative lamps, bedside tables, and fresh flowers enhance the feeling of a true home.

Balcony

A balcony is always a valuable feature in Mediterranean apartments, and this unit includes one that expands the living space outdoors. It’s ideal for enjoying breakfast in the sun, reading in the afternoon, or sipping tea on warm evenings. With space for a small table and chairs, the balcony extends the usability of the apartment throughout the year.

Lighting and Decoration

Lighting plays an important role in this home. A combination of spotlights and standing lamps brightens the apartment, creating a warm and inviting environment. Personal touches such as framed photos and wall art add individuality, ensuring the apartment feels like more than just a space—it feels like a home.

Overall, the apartment combines modern design with touches of traditional coziness, making it adaptable for different lifestyles.

Location Advantages – Close to the Sea and Everyday Conveniences

The location of Edge Residence ensures that residents can enjoy both coastal living and daily practicality.

Moreover, being so close to the coast increases the rental potential of the property, as holidaymakers and long-term tenants often prioritize proximity to the sea.

Investment Potential – High Rental Demand in Mahmutlar

What if your new beginning in Alanya started with a home that has never been lived in?

Imagine stepping into an apartment where every surface is untouched, every corner shines with freshness, and the air itself feels like a promise of new possibilities. This is the experience that awaits atOba Green Side Residence, where a brand new 2 room, 53 m² apartment combines practical design with modern facilities, offering both comfort and value for the future.

Oba is one of Alanya’s most balanced areas — close enough to the city center to feel connected, yet spacious enough to provide calm and greenery. With sandy beaches just a few minutes away and daily conveniences all around, it has become a favorite not only for local families but also for international buyers. Green Side Residence enhances this appeal with a secure gated complex, pools, wellness facilities, and well-planned homes. Living Room with Natural Light

Bathroom Comfort
High-quality ceramics and a glass shower cabin define the bathroom. The modern fittings and clean finishes underline a sense of freshness, fitting for a home that has never been used before.

Bedroom
The bedroom balances intimacy with light. Generous windows ensure a bright atmosphere during the day, while its placement within the layout ensures privacy. The neutral palette allows new owners to create either a minimalist retreat or a cozy, colorful environment.

Balcony with Views

Social Amenities for Everyday Wellbeing

These amenities turn the residence into more than just a place to live. They create a lifestyle where home feels like a private retreat.

Life in Oba – A Place of Balance and Ease

Oba has become one of Alanya’s most desirable neighborhoods for good reason. It combines local authenticity with modern infrastructure, making it a perfect environment for both permanent living and seasonal stays.

  • Beaches– Just 2.4 km from the residence, sandy shores invite swimming, water sports, and seaside walks.

Life here flows easily. Whether walking among palm trees on the seafront promenade, cycling along dedicated paths, or enjoying dinner at a local restaurant, Oba offers a mix of convenience and leisure.

Families Starting Small

Though modest in size, the apartment provides a comfortable home for small families. The complex’s pools, fitness areas, and secure environment add value for family living.

Retirees Seeking Simplicity

For retirees, the combination of manageable space, community facilities, and Oba’s calm environment creates a secure and pleasant daily life.

Investment Perspective – Value Beyond the Walls

Oba continues to attract both Turkish and international buyers, which fuels demand for rental properties and raises property values over time. Green Side Residence, with its new construction, security, and amenities, positions itself as a strong candidate for capital appreciation.

Neutral wall colors allow buyers to experiment with different decoration styles, from Scandinavian simplicity to Mediterranean brightness.

With neutral wall and floor tones, the room is ready to be styled in any direction—soft pastel themes, modern minimalism, or even a bold contemporary look.

property_title: New Built Apartment with Pool and Nature View in Demirtas Plaza Alanya
property_description:
When people search for property in Alanya, their first thoughts usually go to Mahmutlar, Kestel, or Cleopatra Beach. These areas are indeed popular, but they also come with higher prices and busier streets. Demirta≈ü, on the other hand, offers something different — an untouched landscape, quieter beaches, and a slower rhythm of life. With new developments rising, such asDemirta≈ü Plaza, buyers now have the chance to own modern apartments in a district that still feels authentic.

This particular unit is a2 room apartment of 60 m², with 1 bathroom and 1 balcony. It will be delivered inMay 2025, giving buyers the advantage of purchasing early at favorable terms. The apartment is unfurnished, allowing full freedom to design and decorate the interior.

Interior and Layout

Although compact, the layout has been designed for efficiency and comfort. The living room connects seamlessly with the kitchen, forming the core of the apartment. From here, glass doors open to a balcony that overlooks thepool and surrounding greenery, blending indoor and outdoor living.

The bedroom has enough space for a double bed, wardrobe, and side tables, while still receiving generous daylight. The bathroom features modern fittings, and its simple design will appeal to those who prefer clean lines and functionality.

Because the apartment is delivered unfurnished, you can decide whether to keep things minimalist or bring in colorful details that reflect your personality. Some buyers may prefer Scandinavian light tones, while others might go for Mediterranean-inspired ceramic touches. Either way, the neutral foundation makes personalization easy.

Balcony as a Lifestyle Feature

In regions like Demirta≈ü, balconies are not just architectural add-ons — they are extensions of daily life. The balcony in this apartment provides enough space for a small table and chairs, making it an ideal spot for morning coffee or evening relaxation. Thepool view and natural surroundingscreate a calming backdrop.

For those who enjoy cooking at home, the balcony also works perfectly as a place to dry herbs, keep potted plants, or even add a small outdoor shelf for seasonal fruits bought from the local markets.

Complex Features

Demirta≈ü Plaza offers amenities that support a balanced lifestyle:

  • Outdoor poolfor warm summer days

  • Children’s poolfor families

  • Fitness roomfor active residents

  • Saunafor relaxation after exercise

  • Landscaped gardenfor daily walks

  • Elevatorfor convenient access

These features make the residence suitable not only for year-round living but also as a holiday home. The pool and garden create a community atmosphere where neighbors can meet, while the fitness and sauna areas provide healthy routines without leaving the building.

About Demirta≈ü: A Different Face of Alanya

Unlike Mahmutlar or Oba, Demirta≈ü has kept its traditional rhythm. It is not dominated by hotels or tourism infrastructure. Instead, wide agricultural fields define the scenery, and many locals continue to farm. This gives the area a genuine village-like character, but with access to the sea and essential services.

Everyday Practicality

In the center of Demirta≈ü, just500 meters from the apartment, you will find small grocery stores, greengrocers, bakeries, and a few local restaurants. These are usually family-run businesses, where owners greet you by name after a few visits. For larger shopping trips, residents typically drive or take public transport to Mahmutlar or Alanya center.

Transport Connections

Public buses and minibuses pass regularly on the main road, withAlanya city center reachable in about 40 minutes. Taxis are also available for those who prefer private transport. TheGazipa≈üa Airport, only20 km away, is a major advantage for international buyers who travel frequently.

Beaches and Nature

One of the most appealing features of Demirta≈ü is its coastline. Thebeaches are clean and relatively empty, even in the peak of summer. They are perfect for swimming, sunbathing, or quiet walks along the shore. Unlike central Alanya, you won’t find crowded beach clubs here; instead, the focus is on simplicity and nature.

Beyond the beach, theSapadere Canyonis close by — a well-known natural attraction with walking paths, waterfalls, and picnic areas. The green mountains surrounding the district also invite hiking and cycling enthusiasts.

Dining

While the area doesn’t have a large restaurant scene, what it offers is authentic. Small, family-run places serve home-style Turkish meals, and along the shore, a few fish restaurants provide freshly caught seafood in a relaxed atmosphere. For many residents, this local approach to dining is part of the charm.

  • Turkish Bath (Hamam)– A traditional wellness experience right at home.

  • Generator– Ensures uninterrupted electricity in all seasons.

These amenities mean that whether you live here year-round or use it as a holiday home, you’ll always have a variety of activities and comforts at your fingertips.

Mahmutlar – A Peaceful yet Lively Coastal District

Mahmutlar is one of Alanya’s most popular neighborhoods, offering a mix of large residential areas and a thriving tourism scene. It lies between the Mediterranean coast and the Taurus Mountains, about 10 km east of Alanya city center. The district is especially popular with international residents, creating a welcomingexpat community.

Lifestyle and Atmosphere

Mahmutlar is ideal for those who want a calm, relaxing environment without losing access to urban conveniences. The long coastline invites swimming, sunbathing, and water sports, while the Taurus Mountain foothills offer opportunities for hiking and picnics in nature. The area is also perfect for cycling, with scenic routes both along the coast and inland.

Shopping and Services

While most main shops, such as butchers, bakeries, and hardware stores, are located in the center of Mahmutlar, smaller markets and shops are scattered throughout the district. Every Tuesday, thelocal marketbrings fresh produce, clothing, and household items, making it easy to shop for both essentials and special finds.

For larger-scale shopping,YektaMallandAkdeniz Park Mallare both located in Mahmutlar, providing access to brand-name stores and indoor dining.

Dining and Cafés

Mahmutlar is home to numerous family-run cafés, giving the area a friendly, local atmosphere. Alongside these, you’ll also find well-known Turkish and international restaurant and café chains, ensuring plenty of variety.

Transport Connections

Getting around Mahmutlar is simple. Local minibuses operate frequently within the district, including routes toward Kargƒ±cak and Alanya. Buses to Alanya city center run approximately every 10 minutes in both directions. Taxis are also available almost everywhere, offering convenience for short trips or airport transfers.

Proximity to Neighboring Districts

Mahmutlar is close toKargƒ±cakandKestel, providing even more leisure and shopping opportunities. While it is more active and lively than its neighbors, Mahmutlar still maintains a relaxed seaside charm.

Investment Potential – High Demand in a Popular Area

With its growing popularity among both local and international buyers, Mahmutlar offers strong investment potential. Apartments within walking distance of the beach, in well-maintained complexes with full social facilities, are always in high demand.

  • Rental Yield– Seasonal holiday rentals and long-term leases both bring solid returns.

  • Resale Value– Limited availability of modern apartments near the beach ensures stable property appreciation.

  • Lifestyle Appeal– The combination of coastal living, modern facilities, and an international community attracts buyers year-round.

A Typical Day in Mahmutlar

Imagine starting your morning with a walk along the promenade, followed by breakfast at one of the seaside cafés. Later, you might shop at the local Tuesday market, picking up fresh fruit and vegetables. The afternoon could be spent swimming in the complex’s pool or enjoying a Turkish bath session, while evenings might involve a barbecue with friends or a relaxed dinner in the center of Mahmutlar.

This is everyday life here—balanced, convenient, and surrounded by the natural beauty of the Mediterranean.

property_title: Apartment in Green Garden Residence completed June 2025
property_description:
What if your firsthome in Alanyacould feel like a brand-new canvas for the life you imagine?

Many buyers dream of moving to Alanya’s Oba area — drawn by its endless beaches, lively markets, and the comfort of knowing everything is just a walk away. But finding a newly built apartment that allows you to start fresh, decorate to your taste, and enjoy the advantages of a full social complex is not always simple.

Green Garden Residence delivers exactly that. Completed in June 2025, this boutique project offers modern design, quality construction, and amenities designed for both relaxation and practicality.

Only 1,800 meters from the sea (around a 20-minute walk, or just a few minutes by car), offering the perfect balance between coastal living and everyday convenience. And with a clean title deed ready for transfer, this 2 room, 50 m² corner apartment is more than a property — it’s the beginning of a lifestyle.

Interiors That Wait for Your Touch

Because the apartment is delivered unfurnished, it becomes a blank page for its new owner. Yet the choices made by the developer already establish a strong foundation:

Floors That Elevate Space
Large, glossy tiles with a marble-like finish stretch across the living areas, reflecting natural light and enhancing the sense of space. They offer both elegance and easy maintenance — ideal for modern living.

Walls That Keep Possibilities Open
Painted in neutral cream and white, the walls serve as a subtle backdrop. They allow for maximum flexibility, whether you prefer the clean lines of Scandinavian minimalism, the warmth of Mediterranean textures, or the bold character of industrial chic.

Windows That Frame Light and Views
Black-framed, floor-to-ceiling windows define the atmosphere of the apartment. They add modern contrast while ensuring natural light pours in. With a view of the pool and surrounding cityscape, the living space feels open, airy, and connected.

A Kitchen with Modern Precision
The open-plan kitchen is compact but efficient. White cabinetry keeps the space bright, while a black stone-effect backsplash adds a dramatic counterpoint. This contrast provides both elegance and modern energy.

Ceiling and Lighting Details
Recessed spotlights give the apartment a clean, contemporary rhythm. The lighting plan ensures functionality, but it also highlights the neutral palette, making the space feel brighter and more inviting.

Taken together, these features turn the apartment into a ready canvas. With the right furniture, it can adapt to very different lifestyles: minimalist calm, vibrant youthfulness, or refined sophistication.

Daily Life Made Practical

The layout may be compact, but it has been designed to maximize comfort. The living area connects smoothly with the kitchen, creating a sociable hub where cooking and conversation blend naturally. The balcony extends this space outdoors, offering views of the pool below — perfect for a morning coffee or evening pause.

This is a home built for functional ease. Its proportions make it easy to maintain, while still offering enough room to feel spacious. For single professionals, couples, or small families, it answers the question of how to live in Oba with both convenience and style.

Lifestyle Options for Every Taste

The neutral backdrop invites creativity. Depending on the choices of its owner, the apartment could transform into:

  • Scandinavian Retreat– White furniture, natural wood accents, and light textiles emphasize airiness and calm.

  • Industrial Modern– Black metal shelving, statement lighting, and leather chairs create an edgy urban atmosphere.

  • Youthful Mediterranean– Pastel fabrics, woven details, and green plants add vibrancy and local warmth.

Each approach harmonizes with the existing finishes, proving that this home is flexible enough to support any vision.

Facilities That Turn a Complex into a Community

Green Garden Residence was designed not only for living, but for living well. The amenities ensure residents can relax, stay active, and enjoy community life without leaving home:

  • Swimming pool with sun terrace

  • Fitness center

  • Sauna and Turkish bath

  • Children’s playroom and pool

  • Landscaped green areas and pavilion

  • Barbecue space for social gatherings

  • Secure entrance with door guards and 24/7 cameras

  • Bicycle parking and open car park

These features create a residential setting that feels more like a small resort — but with the privacy and comfort of a home.

Oba – Where Daily Needs Meet Seaside Leisure

The location adds further strength. Oba is one of Alanya’s most balanced neighborhoods, where modern living blends with a relaxed seaside lifestyle.

  • Beaches and Sports– Residents enjoy kilometers of sandy coastline for swimming, sunbathing, and water sports, plus tennis and football fields nearby.

  • Markets Twice Weekly– Mondays and Thursdays bring vibrant street markets, filled with fresh produce, clothes, and household goods.

  • Healthcare Access– Alanya Training and Research Hospital is located in Oba, giving families and retirees extra reassurance.

  • Transport– Almost every bus route passes through Oba, meaning the city center and nearby areas like Tosmur, Kestel, and Mahmutlar are easily reached.

  • Shops and Dining– From Migros to small local shops, and from international restaurants to local cafés, everyday needs are always close.

Living here means not having to choose between leisure and practicality — both are naturally integrated into daily life.

Who Will Feel at Home in Green Garden Residence?

Young Couples and Families

Compact but efficient, the apartment makes daily living easy while offering the benefits of a full complex. Families will appreciate the children’s facilities, while couples will enjoy the privacy of a corner unit.

Investors

Newly completed in 2025, the apartment holds high rental potential. Its location, social amenities, and fresh construction appeal to both long-term tenants and short-term holiday renters, ensuring steady income streams.

Digital Nomads

The quiet setting, strong natural light, and balcony views make this apartment a strong option for remote professionals. A home office can easily fit into the living area, while leisure is just outside the door.

International Buyers

For those considering a first property in Turkey, Green Garden Residence represents a manageable size, attractive price point, and the reassurance of a newly built, fully serviced complex.

Investment Potential – Why This Apartment Works

Alanya’s property market has grown steadily, with Oba playing a central role. The scarcity of newly built apartments close to the sea makes properties like this highly attractive for both resale and rental.

Moreover, because the project was only completed in June 2025, owners benefit from the assurance of brand-new construction, modern regulations, and efficient building systems. Combined with the location and facilities, it is a package designed to hold value and generate returns.

Choosing the Right Partner in Your Search

  • Inspection Trips– For clients abroad, we arrange visits that allow you to see properties firsthand, explore the area, and decide with confidence.

By working with us, you gain more than access to listings. You gain a reliable partner dedicated to protecting your investment and helping you build the life you envision in Turkey.

property_description:
When people search for property in Alanya, Mahmutlar often stands out as a district that balances both residential comfort and lively community life. In this setting, Euro Residence presents a brand-new 55 m² apartment with a practical 2 room layout. Completed in February 2025 and delivered unfurnished, this home offers buyers a clean canvas to create their own interior style while enjoying the full advantages of complex facilities and proximity to the sea.

Interior Features and Design Potential

Walking into this apartment, you immediately notice its modern foundations. Since the property is delivered empty, it leaves complete freedom for the new owner to define the atmosphere:

  • Floors:The large-format dark grey porcelain tiles provide a strong and contemporary base. Light-colored furniture in beige, cream, or light oak can balance the tone, creating a brighter feel.

  • Kitchen:With minimalist white and grey cabinets, the kitchen already offers a neutral template. Adding marble-effect countertops and backsplashes will enhance the sense of luxury. Built-in LED lighting and spot fixtures can further emphasize the modern lines.

  • Ceiling:A recessed gypsum detail runs along the ceiling, designed for hidden LED strips. Warm lighting here can transform the apartment into an elegant retreat during evenings.

  • Balcony:The glass-railed balcony feels spacious and open, inviting you to arrange it with compact furniture such as a rattan sofa set or a foldable dining table. It’s the perfect spot for enjoying the mountain and neighborhood views.

This property can easily adapt to different interior concepts — minimal, modern, Scandinavian, or colorful eclectic styles.

Complex and Building Facilities

Living in Euro Residence brings more than just your own four walls. Residents benefit from:

  • Outdoor swimming pool

  • Separate children’s pool

These features make the property not only comfortable for year-round living but also attractive for rental investment.

Location Advantages of Mahmutlar

Mahmutlar has become one of Alanya’s most recognizable neighborhoods, known for its international community and mix of modern amenities with relaxed coastal living. The apartment lies only850 meters from the sea, offering easy beach access while remaining connected to daily essentials.

  • Shops & Markets:Local bakeries, butchers, and family-run stores line the streets, while Yekta Mall and Akdeniz Park Shopping Center provide larger retail options.

  • Transport:Regular buses connect Mahmutlar to Alanya city center every 10 minutes, and taxis are widely available.

  • Lifestyle:Families will find playgrounds and sports facilities, while those who enjoy outdoor activities can explore the foothills of the Taurus Mountains for hiking and picnics.

  • Social Life:The area hosts both cozy family cafés and well-known international restaurant chains, giving residents a wide choice of dining experiences.

  • Weekly Bazaar:Every Tuesday, Mahmutlar’s market bursts with fresh fruits, vegetables, and local products, bringing authentic Turkish daily life to your doorstep.

Mahmutlar combines the peaceful rhythm of a residential area with the convenience of urban life, making it one of Alanya’s most sought-after districts.
